wikipedia_page.main: William Charles Brice (3 July 1921 – 24 July 2007) was a British ethnographer and linguist.

response: * William Brice (1921–2008), American artist and abstract painter
* William Brice (ethnographer), (1921–2007), British ethnographer and linguist
William Arnstein, professionally William Brice (April 23, 1921 – March 3, 2008) was an American artist known for his large-scale abstract paintings.
